actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to promote the development of American handcrafts.

summary.text: Requires the Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts to establish in Washington, D.C. a National Center for American Handcrafts to provide facilities and assistance in promoting American handcrafts. Authorizes appropriations of sums necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to promote the development of American handcrafts.
